about.title: About FemRes
about.subtitle: Bringing together feminist voices from around the world to advance gender equality

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: FemRes is committed to becoming the world's premier feminist content aggregation platform. We believe in the power of knowledge and information to drive social change, bringing together feminist thought, research, and practice from around the world to provide rich learning resources for everyone concerned with gender equality.
mission.description2: In an era of information fragmentation, we use intelligent content screening and classification to ensure that every piece of recommended content undergoes rigorous quality control, enabling users to efficiently access valuable information and gain deep insights into diverse feminist perspectives.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The fundamental principles that guide our progress

genderEquality.title: Gender Equality
genderEquality.description: Advocating for all genders to enjoy equal rights, opportunities, and dignity in political, economic, social, and cultural spheres

intersectionality.title: Intersectional Perspective
intersectionality.description: Recognizing the intersectional impacts of gender with race, class, sexual orientation, disability, and other identities, pursuing comprehensive social justice

knowledgeEmpowerment.title: Knowledge Empowerment
knowledgeEmpowerment.description: Believing that education and knowledge dissemination are important pathways to achieving gender equality, committed to helping more people understand feminism

openInclusion.title: Open Inclusion
openInclusion.description: Welcoming people of different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences to participate in dialogue, seeking consensus in diversity and promoting understanding through differences

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Providing you with the highest quality content experience

smartAggregation.title: Smart Content
smartAggregation.description: Through advanced AI technology combined with manual review, screening high-quality feminist content from massive information

preciseClassification.title: Precise Classification System
preciseClassification.description: Establishing a comprehensive topic classification system to help users quickly locate content areas of interest

diverseContent.title: Diverse Content Forms
diverseContent.description: Covering books, articles, videos, podcasts, academic papers and other content forms to meet different learning preferences

contentTypes.title: Content Types
contentTypes.subtitle: Diverse content forms to meet different learning needs

coreTopics.title: Core Topics
coreTopics.subtitle: Covering various important areas of feminist concern

workplaceEquality.title: Workplace Equality
workplaceEquality.description: Eliminating workplace gender discrimination, promoting equal pay, breaking the glass ceiling

bodilyAutonomy.title: Bodily Autonomy
bodilyAutonomy.description: Protecting women's decision-making power over their own bodies, including reproductive and health rights

educationRights.title: Education Rights
educationRights.description: Ensuring equal educational opportunities for all genders, eliminating bias in education

politicalParticipation.title: Political Participation
politicalParticipation.description: Increasing women's representation and participation in political decision-making

familyRoles.title: Family Roles
familyRoles.description: Redefining family responsibility allocation, breaking traditional gender role constraints

genderViolence.title: Gender Violence
genderViolence.description: Addressing and stopping all forms of gender-based violence, protecting victims' rights

mediaRepresentation.title: Media Representation
mediaRepresentation.description: Critiquing gender stereotypes in media, promoting diverse expression

historicalFigures.title: Historical Figures
historicalFigures.description: Rediscovering and recognizing outstanding women in history and their contributions

team.title: Team Philosophy
team.subtitle: Jointly maintained by volunteers passionate about the feminist cause
team.description: FemRes is an open-source project driven by volunteers. Our team members come from different backgrounds, including technical developers, content editors, feminist researchers, and social activists. We come together because of a shared belief: in the power of knowledge and in a future of gender equality.

openSource.title: Open Source Transparency
openSource.description: Code and content strategies are completely open

communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Everyone is welcome to participate and contribute

joinUs.title: Join Us, Grow Together
joinUs.description: Whether you are a content creator, technical developer, research scholar, or enthusiastic reader, you are welcome to join the FemRes community and contribute to the cause of gender equality together

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or collaboration intentions, please feel free to contact us through the following methods

contact.title: Contact Us

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are answers to some common questions

howToSubmit.question: How to submit content to FemRes?
howToSubmit.answer: You can submit content by sending an email to submissions@femres.org. Please include the content title, author, description, relevant links, and other information in your email. Our editorial team will carefully review each submission and respond within 7 business days.

howToFilter.question: How does FemRes filter content?
howToFilter.answer: We use a combination of AI technology and manual review. First, algorithms screen high-quality content, then professional editorial teams conduct secondary reviews to ensure content accuracy, relevance, and value. We particularly focus on content diversity and inclusivity.

howToVolunteer.question: How to become a FemRes volunteer?
howToVolunteer.answer: We welcome volunteers from all fields! Please send an email to volunteer@femres.org, introducing your background, expertise, and areas you'd like to contribute to. We need various types of volunteers including content editors, technical developers, designers, and translators.

donations.question: Does FemRes accept donations?
donations.answer: As a non-profit project, we rely on volunteers and community support to operate. If you wish to support our work through donations, please contact partnership@femres.org for details. All donations will be used for platform maintenance and content development.

reportIssues.question: How to report content issues or errors?
reportIssues.answer: If you find any content errors, broken links, or inappropriate content, please contact us immediately at info@femres.org. Please provide specific page links and problem descriptions, and we will handle them as soon as possible.

info.title: Contact Information
info.note: FemRes is an open-source project operated by volunteers, and we strive to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours

contribute.title: Contribute Content
contribute.subtitle: Your contributions will help more people understand feminism and jointly promote gender equality

types.title: What can you contribute?
types.subtitle: FemRes welcomes various forms of high-quality content contributions

books.title: Book Recommendations
books.description: Recommend excellent feminist-related books, including theoretical works, literary works, biographies, etc.
requirements: Books must be related to feminism or gender studies
Provide detailed book information and reasons for recommendation

articles.title: Article Sharing
articles.description: Share high-quality articles, including academic papers, commentary articles, news reports, etc.
requirements: Articles must be authoritative and credible
Content must be related to feminist issues

videos.title: Video Content
videos.description: Recommend or create educational videos, including lectures, documentaries, interviews, etc.

podcasts.title: Podcast Content
podcasts.description: Share feminist-related podcast programs and audio content
requirements: Podcast content must be relevant to the theme

academic.title: Academic Papers
academic.description: Share peer-reviewed academic research and papers

translation.title: Translation Work
translation.description: Help translate quality content to give more people learning opportunities

process.title: Contribution Process
process.subtitle: Simple steps to easily share your content

steps.title: Submit Content
steps.description: Submit your content suggestions through forms or GitHub

steps.title: Quality Review
steps.description: Our team will carefully review content quality and relevance

steps.title: Publish & Share
steps.description: Approved content will be officially published on the platform

guidelines.title: Contribution Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Please follow these guidelines to ensure content quality

rules.title: Content Relevance
rules.description: All content must be directly related to feminism, gender studies, or related topics

rules.title: Quality Standards
rules.description: Ensure content has educational value, accuracy, and credibility

rules.title: Copyright Respect
rules.description: Respect intellectual property and ensure shared content doesn't infringe on others' copyrights

rules.title: Inclusivity
rules.description: Welcome diverse perspectives, but do not accept discriminatory or hate speech

recognition.title: Contributor Recognition
recognition.subtitle: Thank you to every friend who contributes to FemRes
benefits: Credit contributor information on relevant content pages
Priority access to platform feature testing

footer.description: A feminist content aggregation platform dedicated to advancing gender equality and bringing together high-quality feminist content from around the world.
